fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Voorlichtings- en afzetbevorderingsacties voor landbouwproducten, subsidy proposals, execution of (cofinanced) promotion programmes
goals__remit: Horticonsult Global Partners BV is a network organization, specialized in strategic policy studies and market research, drawing up of inventories for strategic policy purposes of  horticulture and floriculture industries and export promotion of horticulture and ornamental products. Besides that,  exchange of knowledge, amongst other means by organizing seminars for all categories of stakeholders, belongs to Horticonsult’s core business. Composing and consultation of subsidy proposals regarding agricultural promotion. Execution of promotion campaign in )mainly) the agricultural sector
industry_forums: Participating as speaker and advisor to the EP with regard to the promotion measures concerning agricultural products
relevant_communication: Executive Body for promotion activities for agricultural products.
